titleStmt.title: The skirmisher confounded being a collection of several passages taken forth of some books of John Cheyney's, who stiles himself the author of the skirmish upon Quakerism : in which is the baseness, wickedness, collected by ... Roger Haydocke.
titleStmt.author: Haydock, Roger, 1643-1696.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
